title: Macroeconomics
description: Quiz on the fundamentals of macroeconomics, including key concepts, measures, and policies.

answers.c: The behavior of the economy as a whole

questions.question: Which economist is considered the founder of macroeconomics?

answers.c: Aggregate measures such as GDP and employment

questions.question: When is macroeconomic equilibrium achieved?

answers.b: When aggregate supply equals aggregate demand
